snippet: SCHLESSEL--Walter "Wally" (92). February 29, 1924 - May 6, 2016 Died from a full and loving life well lived. Famously humble, funny, generous, caring, gracious, gentle and strong. A class act and a gentleman to the end. He will live on in the many people he touched but none moreso than his loving family. He is survived by his beloved and beautiful wife of 70 years, Marilyn, his two loving sons, Derek and Bobby and his cherished grandson, Ryan. Funeral services will be held at Gutterman Warheit Chappel, 7240 N Federal Highway, Boca Raton, Monday, May 9 at noon. A private graveside service will be held Wednesday at Beth Moses Cemetery in New York. 1/3
